content.detailedDescription:
This is a continuation of previous report filed last night.
i wanted to include the pictures.  pictures are not altered.
glow, lights, aura in clouds visible with naked eye so it's not lens flare.
not sure what this is but never seen anything like it before.
i got out of my car to take all these photos. photos taken at different times and locations
around huntersville, nc. photos are tagged.  hopefully you can look at them and judge for yourself.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened to me when i was a six year boy. in late august in 1961, my mother and i went to my grandparents house out in the country. this is a few miles out of our home town. they were out of town on a trip, so i went with my mother out there to feed the dogs and water the inside plants. this was late in the evening just before dusk. i was outside playing while she was in the house. i was looking to the north across the road and i saw a silver disk shaped object coming toward me. it flew over the house and towards the back. there is a driveway between the garage and barn. it came down and hovered between them. it was hovering about 15 to 20 feet from the ground. it was silver in color with a dome and round windows. i could hear a humming sound. i watched it for a few minutes, then started walking towards it. about that time my mother was looking out the window and saw me moving towards the craft. she came out the back door and yelled for me to stop and began coming towards me. as she approached me, the disk began to rise back up slowly into the sky. it then flew off towards the east and was gone. 

this was just the beginning. a short time later i had a man in black experience. through the years my family and i have had several encounters. we never told this to people because of what they might say. i am getting older now and i think it's time to speak out.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovered near me for a few minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was out over the willamette river on christmas eve, 2011, with friends.  i noticed two orange spheres rise over the city, in the distance.  they rose together in unison, not breaking their distance apart.  the top one went stationary, while the bottom one swung around it some 45 degrees, not departing from the same distance apart.  the top one faded out, followed immediately by the bottom one.  it was witnessed by myself and another in our group, clearly.  i have found other reports, online, of exactly this type of sighting in our area, around the same time, but not the same night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 orange spheres over city of eugene

content.detailedDescription:
I'm in saint joseph, and last night i saw a ufo around 7:40pm. it was very low (under 1000ft) off the ground, and it slowly flew overhead, heading north eastish. from what i could see, it was cigar shaped. it had 2 lights, a green one at the front and an orange one at the back. i know it wasn't a plane, because it was travelling in the direction of the green->orange light. it probably went about 5-10 miles, then it started changing directions. first it would move left, then right, then forward, then back. and it was moving without making the turns a regular aircraft would make. probably watched it for about 10 minutes or so (unfortunately it was too far away to get any pictures or video of). 

when it was flying overhead, there was another low flying plane about 500-1000 ft above/behind it, however it took a different path, and both plane/ufo went in different directions.   the ufo lights i saw for some time, however the plane went out of sight within a couple of minutes, however the ufo lights continued to move back/forward/left/right.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object flew overhead, flew in a straight line, and ascended. then it moved left/right/forward/back for some time.

content.detailedDescription: My subtle eye caught this tiny ufo flying over while guarding a 55 acre construction power transmission site. the image looked like reptile face with an extra terrestrial ape like faces(2). i took the video and enclosed is the picture taken from the video. out of the 6 total ufo sightings i have witnessed this is the masterpiece and strange. the tiny ufo passed with a stream of light. the enclosed picture of ufo is copyrighted and please take permission to reproduce it. however, you are allowed to analyze it and please tell me what it is. is it a satellite, drone, extra terrestrial? what it is.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Tiny ufo caught by my subtle spirtitual eye.

content.detailedDescription: Three witnesses, including myself.
content.summary: Each of the three large orange lights had around it an array of 50-100 smaller lights.

content.detailedDescription: At 7pm on dec. 30th. 2011 we saw a large round red-orange fireball moving north at about 200mph at around 2,000 ft up heading north, at first we thought it was a plane on fire but after a while we realized it was not a plane. there was no sound or trail coming from the object and even with two of us using binocs. we could not make out any detail. we watched it for 4-5 mins. slowly head north and go into a cloudbank. it appeard to be around -20 magnatude with a appearant dia. of 1/2 to 1/3 dia. of the moon. looked like a red-orange fireball with flame like edges, the brightness stayed the same never dimming or brightining. we even saw several jet pass within a few miles of the object
content.summary: Fireball like object slowly heading north over orlando fl.

While i was walking in a remote area, a very white bright ufo cylinder/tube/cigar shape ufo slowly flown over me at a very low altitude...

i made a reconstitution of the event with a video on youtube... enjoy!

tube 

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Very white bright cylinder/tube

content.detailedDescription:
this is one very strange looking ufo,
earlier that morning (12-30-2011) i reported ufo sightings to mufon; my intention at this time was to take photos of commercial airlines with contrails to use as a photo simulation and try to show what i saw that morning. as reported to mufon, it was not evident at that time until the photos were downloaded onto my computer that i had actually captured 2 ufo���s on the same photo along with commercial aircraft and contrails.
camera and tripod (canon rebel t3 with 300 mm zoom lens)
i was not expecting to see anything until i was surprised by this craft which came from my right side and passed in front of me i believe approximately 500-1000 feet up it was close.
i quickly took the picture and was not able to take a second one, it was no longer there
the ufo in the photo as my wife says it looks like the lamppost we have outside i suppose it does, i took a photo of the lamppost exactly where i photographed the ufo. (photo attached) the lamppost has trees in between sky and lamppost so therefore it���s a ufo captured on the photo.

regards
phil singer
content.summary: This is a very strange ufo

content.detailedDescription: I, was sitting on my porch one peaceful evening, all of a sudden!To the left of me,i saw a set of lights,blinking and traveling slowly, in an easterly direction, coming from the west. it looked as if, some sort of darkness, behind the lights. i said what the,@#$#! i'm looking at something i should'nt be seeing! (i was quite shocked! and glad! other people, could witness this as well!) my wife, and the neighbors with me, said where? i stood up and said, look! and ran off the porch! as it was drifting, with no motor sounds! with lights near to the ground! and a dark blue, comma shaped object..Traveling with it! but, it was, miles away from the closer lights, my camera was trained on! it was something none of us had ever seen before! i ran to the corner of the street,pulled out my camera phone! and captured a strange, event unfolding on video! it traveled,towards a busy major street, i just knew..It would cause a panic! but, other than people behind me..In the next blocks the object was going in! i regret now! that i did not follow it..To see it take off! or finish it's task! one of my friends, thinks aliens my be checking on me! maybe!Because, back in 1987..Late summer, my wife, a friend and i, watched a blue ball of light, fly into view! and it stopped, flutter, pulsate, and zigzag! it blinked,and we knew! it was trying to get our attention! it did!My wife, came outside, saw us looking in the sky, said oh my god! what is that? we told her,thats a ufo! she said sure is! and as if it heard us! moved from a standing/hovering position..Shuddered..Zigzaged...Moved to the right again! and then took off at an angle..And was gone in a second..Away from the earth! no clouds, no sound! i wish cell phones..With cameras were around then! we knew we had been allowed to witness something  few people get to see! and no one would believe us! i know it was late summer,early fall,of 1987...The second event my cell phone camera recorded the time and date! so i won't forget the facts! maybe? someone could check radar...Reports for 10-4-07 i just figured out how, to upload my video to the computer! a week ago! and what i am seeing now! is not! what i saw, with my naked eye! this video needs to be inhanced...An subjected to analysis! i know now! that we are not! alone!
content.summary: Observed a series of  lights... slowly.. (near to the ground) seemed to be on a mission...With  some sort of intent..Or  testing is the impression i   got!  coming from the west drifting east, i ran off my porch and, captured it on video using my phone!

content.detailedDescription: Ore bank road we were sitting there talking when i noticed two lights in the sky my boyfriend said it was a plane but when i look back 4 to6 minutes latter it was still there that is when we noticed it was on the ground it was pyramid shaped with a light at each tip and they changed from red to gold to blue it was huge,it didn't dawn on me of what i had saw for about 30 minutes
content.summary: We saw a light thought it was plane looked closer and it was statinary in a cleared area

content.detailedDescription:
First time was around 1978 or 1979 summer, (i was around 10 years) around ���8:00 hs. aprox. in cordoba city, i was playing football in a street with many friends, the thing was seen by much of the city people, reported also in the local tv news and newspaper. it was a big smoke ring, donut shaped thing in the sky with one direction s.N. didnt seems to be inteligent flight, was seen also in another cities around.-
in the third week of 1990, vacationing in the lolog lake, near san martin de los andes, patagonia, argentina, i was with another 4 friends camping in the shore, (speaking with friend around a fire) of the lake and during the night (aprox. 22 or 23 hs.) saw the same white smokelike ring, donutlke shapped but was not made by cloud or smoke, if not like to be fluorescent but semi transparent (possible to see some stars behind the thing), it was near and we all saw for 20 minutes aproximately the huge thing, traveling slowly and rarely the thing started to disappear in a "dark hole in the sky".- i have never forgot the experience, after more then 20 years is present in my mind and during dreams sometimes.- i often see one of the another guy that also saw the thing.- this time was heaviest experience.- after notice the objet we told to some friends but didnt care about.-  it was a very dark night without moon, and one of the friends saw first the objet and told "look what a beautifull it come the moon", i replied "is not the moon", everybody there were amused and firtsly scared, not after some minutes the object was in the sky. after 20 minutes aproximately the object disapear rarely in a black holelike in the middle of the sky.- was very strange. the one of the friend was from pergamino city in buenos aires province, he had taken many pictures with a nikon cammera, starting to take pictures first with flash, lather without flash but without tripode and another with tripode, during the year after the experience i phoned him but didnt wanted to talk with me, strangely, rarely i dont know to now why.- i dont have pictures about the object unfortunately cannot help with documented evidences. - but the first object in 1978/79 was reported in local tv news and also la voz del interior newspaper. was seen by all the city.- congratulations for your work, best regards. g
content.summary: It was like a thick smokelike ring shaped, a huge aereal donut, i saw the same thing also around 1978 or 79 registered by tv news and local newspapers
content.locationName: San Martin de Los Andes, Neuquén

content.detailedDescription: I used camera and pics on 9 ufos with non stop activity, i focused on at least 20 more without moving out of that area of view, my last report i'm going to send
content.summary: Took puppy out, saucer was there on clear sky with more other ufos on camera than my phone could handle, pro coming today and this is my last report, i have 9 on camera

content.detailedDescription: It was a lovely middle august evening, and i was home playing a game of cards with my mother while also watching the television sporadically. at the time we lived in a low income housing project set up like a very long cul-de-sac of duplex apartment buildings. the sun had just set and we were enjoying our card game when the cable service went out. i thought to myself, "ah, this is just a random cable outage", and didn't really give it a second thought. then around 5 or 10 minutes after the cable went out, the power went out as well. it was a clear night, so it wasn't an outage from a thunderstorm and we rarely get brownouts, let alone blackouts even in the height of summer. i decide to carefully work my way through the dark house and get a look out the kitchen window. at this time i was beginning to become a litte more concerned because this was becoming a rather unusual circumstance, as the entire neighborhood and surrounding area as far as i could see was pitch black. about 5 minutes or so passed from the time the power in the apartment went out to when it came back on, but all of the street lights in the area remained out as well as some of the homes visible across the small field. some of the housing project tenants were outside talking to each other, most likely about the outage and i never did go outside myself to get a real good look around (regrettably). i went back to my bedroom and looked out the windows to see if i could see any type of lights on anywhere in those directions to figure out how widespread this outage was. as i looked out the southward facing window in my bedroom, i noticed a light in the sky towards the southeast that seemed very out of place. i had always been fascinated by the night sky for as long as i could remember and was very good at telling the difference between stars, planets, comets, planes, helicopters, satellites, etc, and the light in the sky resembled none of the above. i even opened my window to listen outside to see if there was any noise coming from the direction of the light in the sky, just to be positive that it was not a helicopter searchlight and i could discern nothing audible coming from that way. this just confirmed my initial thoughts that this didn't fit the appearance a helicopter searchlight, because there is a visible shaft of light that comes down in the direction it is pointed, and this object was just a stationary sphere of light hovering in place. i wasn't able to very accurately gauge the distance away from my apartment that this object was, but it was roughly a mile or two away at the most and around about a mile up in the air possibly. from my perspective, it was around 45-55 degrees above the horizon. it was larger than a star by roughly tenfold, but it didn't shine much brighter than one. i watched the light just sit in one place for at least 45 minutes, maybe an hour at most. the whole time that i am watching it, i am pleading to my mother to come and see this light so that i can have at least one other witness to corroborate this event. finally, i was able to convince my mother to come and observe the light through the window. no more than a minute or so after my mother got to the window and observed it as well, the light just accelerates towards the northwest directly over the apartments at an unknown, but very high rate of speed and was long gone before i even had a chance to get to another vantage point. i wasn't able to see whether or not it was ascending as it shot off in the northwesterly direction, so i have no clue where it headed after that initial rapid acceleration. i really wish i had owned a camera or camcorder at the time, i would have loved to have recorded this occasion in another location besides my still vivid memory of the event. maybe someone besides me and my mother witnessed this as well and had the privilege of filming it, but i won't get my hopes up.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in mattoon, il

content.detailedDescription: I was workin gettin supplies from the truck with co workers.I turned my head and saw a realy bright light.When i focused on it my first thought was it looked like a plane on fire.It stayed on the same path and when it passed us it looked like it was almost going up. almost straight up. i didnt know what to think.I said to my co workers what is that and we all looked.After a couple of seconds i knew it wasnt a plane or a comet. i got kinda excited that i saw the object with 3 other people at the same time.My co worker did take a cell phone vid with with our reactions.All that you can see on the vidio is a small dot.I lost sight when it seemed like it was going up.Like it wasnt moveing forward as much as it was going up.It wasnt moving fast at all.No weird movement except that it was lower and went higher with no sound.
content.summary: I thought it was a plane on fire until it got closer

content.detailedDescription: Flickering object, fading and brightening, dripping fire, then dissapeared. directly east of my location,up pretty high at least a mile away, lasted 5 minutes. appeared to be north of airliners flying out of ontario international from my perspective. chinese lantern???
content.summary: Flickering object

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the sidewalk downtown old town arvada, and while talking on the phone i was looking at the clouds as visible by the half moon that night. one cloud caught my attention because it appeared to be shape shifting. as i continued to observe and look for a clarification, it appeared that the cloud wasn't moving, but an object was gliding under the cover of the clouds. denver has very large low hanging clouds. this object would be estimated to be 1000 feet wide or larger. it appeared for 30 seconds from the time i saw it overhead until it vanished quietly in the night sky. my conclusion was that this craft was only seen because of the contrast from the low hanging clouds and the half moonlight creating a difficulty to cloak itself. it had no lights of any kind, and i heard no sounds from the night sky. to place a comparison, there were jets flying so high that night that were barely visible, but yet a sonic roar across the sky could be heard. 
i have a professional background in the field of observations and inspections, so i have a very skilled and trained eye with a phenominal reputation for accuracy and intergity. i am always searching for the truth, and would be willing to speak with mufon an my eyewitness account.

this sighting date and timelines i can look up by my trail of texting friends that night.
content.summary: A large u.F.O. quietly glided over my head, cloaking against clouds and the light from the half-moon

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from east side ace hardware, driving up my alley where i park.  i have a wide view from about the dinasaur on the hill to 180 degrees to the left (rapid valley).  i saw a large fireball at aprox 45 degrees straight ahead of me and went down on the horizon at about a 45 degree angle, with a large trail behind.  and it is not possible for me to estimate where it would have landed.  a wild guess is it landed near edgemont.
content.summary: A bright fireball in the western sky with a trail-went behind dinasaur hill.  hard to tell how far maybe 30 to 50 miles

content.detailedDescription:
Had arrived at a restaurant/bar on the beach in north myrtle beach, south carolina at the corner of 17th ave south and ocean blvd. at about 7:00 or so on october 18th, 2007 and had been there for less than an hour (and less than two beers) when several of us noticed several lights out over the ocean. i / we did not really think much of it at first until the light began to pulsate and move. at times there would be one light (starlike in color and shape) then it would disappear and then reappear enlarged and orange in color. the orange color would disappear and then two, three or four lights would appear and pulsate from a small silver dot to an orange orb. after a half hour or so the lights took off at about 45 to 60 degree angle heading north and then west over the land then took a southern heading at a speed too fast to be an airplane or helocopter. not quite the speed of a shooting star but similar. one clown in the crowd said that it had to be a boat out over the water shooting off flairs!!! - i really wish that was the case.....I am here to tell you that ufo's exist i know what i seen and i am more concerned than excited.

i wish that i had taken the time to have written down and documented the event at the time that it had happened four years ago. i did not know who to tell or where to document my sightings until now while flipping thru the channels and finding a show called ufo's over earth and did a google search for mufon the host of the show.
content.summary: From 1 to 5 lights intermittantly on and off  from a point of silver light to a glowing orange color hovering over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: My friend & i left flagstaff, az heading south towards phoenix on i-17 @ about 1:20pm.  at 2pm i was in the far left (fast) lane & joked with my friend about the sedona 'wanna-be' "hollywood" sign on the mini-mountain to my right.  my friend said "that's the landmark just prior to the exit we needed to get off of.  he told me to move over to the far right lane.  at that moment my car radio went to static.  since i needed to pay attention to the traffic & move to the far right lane i asked him to tune the radio while looking at it.  i looked up in to my rear view mirror only to see 5 white compact cars behind me.  i mentioned that it was odd asking him "where did all of the traffic go?"  all 5 cars passed me on the left.  i noticed all 5 cars had nevada plates. a few seconds later i saw a freeway sign that said kingston - 50 miles.  i asked my friend "isn't kingston near laughlin, nv?"  i came to a crest of freeway only to view laughlin which bordered bullhead city, ca. at that point i realized i was now heading west on i-40.  freaked out, i pulled over & we both paced the side of the road trying to figure out how we got there.  we got back in the car & turned around heading east on i-40 & came upon a van.  i honked & my friend asked the driver what time it was.  it was 5:30pm, 3 hours & 20 minutes had passed.  to this day, i've heard 3 other stories of missing time on this stretch of road, one of which was from a trucker.  truckers had to log there time & miles.  this confirmed we were not crazy.  it's been nearly 18 years since this incident.  neither of us experienced any physical or psychological trauma.  i would like to know if anyone else can't relate to what happened to us or explain it.  i'm still curious.  thank you.
content.summary: There was no ufo sighting.  a missing time event occured

content.detailedDescription: In the same location as last night, can only see it off and on due to the clouds, got a pic of it but its a little cloudy and you could make out the saucer shape
content.summary: Got home from shopping tonight and looked in the spot where i seen it last nite and it was on border of clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep at 130 a.M. in the morning and my boyfriend came home . . neither of us drunk or anything, then out of my arcadia door i saw what i thought was a war, blue and white lights, i ducted, then went to totally blue lights a solid light. my boyfriend went to the aracdia door and couldnt get out like it trapped him in then he got out, i dont remember anything after that tell i woke up.
content.summary: I looked out my window and saw a war, blue and white lights, then stopped and was frozen

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in huntersville, nc and i noticed a weird glow in the clouds so i pulled over and took some photos. i saw this "glow" with my eyes so it's not lens flare. i'm not sure what it is but i never saw a cloud glow like this. nc mufon investigator has photos.
content.summary: Driving through huntersville, nc  and noticed bizarre glow in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to watch our fireworks display.  as i was walking to get a good view i noticed at least 2 objects floating slowly towards where the fireworks were going to go off.  they just stopped outside the area where they go off.  i was really mezmorized by the lights trying to figure out what exactly they were.  everything from plane, to helicopter, to jet went through my mind.  i ended up crossing those all off the list because they always have a blinking lights to let you know they are there. these objects had red lights, they did not blink.  they just stayed there like they were watching what was going to happen. i watched for a bit and had to just say i was imagining things.  after the fireworks were over i noticed they were gone but i also noticed some jets coming to our area.  they were flying in the same area i had seen the red lights.  it really was strange.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several unkown bright red objects hovered in sky

content.detailedDescription: i went outside my house very upset with wife. the object  was trying to get inside a mountain,rectangular shape,green  see through, no noise dull light as soon as it saw us  with my son in a fraction of a second moved into  an  other position about 400 feet in less than a blink of an eye..Finally went inside of the second mountain gone.
content.summary: Just want to know what it was,

content.detailedDescription: I noticed what seemed to be a bright star in the daytime, i had been looking outside my door when i noticed the object. almost daily this object can be seen from my front yard, it also comes at the same time every time. i decided to look at the object through a telescope. after viewing it from my telescope it was apparent to me and my family that it was no ordinary object. i feel this is a site that i have never experienced before. every time i lose site of it, it descends below the tree line.
content.summary: Its a bright pulsating light, with light within light..A ring of fire.
